metadata.title: Danish judge, Azam Tarar discuss structure, functioning of judicial systems

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 07 (APP):Justice Muhammad Ahsan, Judge of the Supreme Court of Denmark, called on Minister for Law and Justice Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar here on Tuesday. Minister of State for Law and Justice Barrister Aqeel Malik, Secretary Law Raja Naeem Akbar, and other senior officials were also present during the meeting. An insightful discussion was held on the structure and functioning of the judicial systems in both Pakistan and Denmark. Justice Ahsan briefed the participants on the working of the Danish judiciary, while the Law Minister shared details about ongoing judicial reforms and initiatives in Pakistan aimed at improving efficiency and access to justice. Both sides explored avenues for future collaboration, Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar appreciated Justice Ahsan's contributions to international judicial cooperation. He termed Justice Ahsan an asset and commended his distinguished career in the field of law and justice. The meeting concluded on a positive note, reaffirming the shared commitment to strengthening cooperation between the judiciaries of Pakistan and Denmark.
